informationList.title: Information
informationList.selectInformation: Choose the topic you want to get information about
informationList.information1: How does the application process work?
informationList.information1Desc: As soon as your information reaches Krembi team, we will reach you on the phone number, first a nice chat and then complete the registration process quickly.
informationList.information2Desc: After the registration process, we complete the official transactions (contracts). We will help you in this process whenever you want ðŸ™‚ The process is already very fast (5 minutes) and simple. You can then start accepting customers immediately.
informationList.information3: How can I communicate with users?
informationList.information3Desc: You can access all the information you may need about users who request appointments and calls from the "appointment details" screen.
informationList.information4: Are customers who request service reliable people?
informationList.information4Desc: Users must make "authentication confirmation" to be able to call service. For this reason, all users who request service have a verified profile ðŸ™‚ However, when you have a negative experience, Krembi operations team is just a phone call away.
informationList.information5: What if the user has trouble paying for the service?
informationList.information5Desc:
A "provision" is taken from the users who make a call (home, office or hotel) in the service payment tab. In other words, after the successful provisioning, you can see the user's service request on the appointment screen.

When the service is completed, the "payment confirmation screen" you send to the user is approved by the user and the payment is transferred to his account after 1 business day.
informationList.information6: When is my service payment credited?
informationList.information6Desc: As you know, there is no problem with cash or pos device payments anyway asÄ±l The main addressee of this problem is "When does the user get to my account when he pays with an online credit card?" ðŸ™‚ Moreover, the first and only in Turkey.
informationList.information7: Can I add another friend to Krembi?
informationList.information7Desc: First of all, this is great news ðŸ™‚ If you want the link of this page, you can easily invite your friend from the "invite a friend" menu on the application screen.
